p: Detection of JEV and WNV IgM antibodies was conducted for all collected acute sera. Sixty-seven cases were positive for JEV IgM antibody, and seven were positive for both JEV and WNV IgM antibodies. Using positive viral IgM antibody in the acute phase as the diagnostic criterion [ 23, 24], there were 67/70 cases of JEV infection and 7/70 cases of possible combined JEV and WNV infection ( Table 1).
